case-study-dish-network.title: Case Study: Dish Network
case-study-dish-network.excerpt: Truffle, though its Truffle University program, taught engineers at DISH how to build blockchain applications.

case-study-microsoft-xbox.title: Case Study: Microsoft Xbox
case-study-microsoft-xbox.ingredients: Azure Blockchain Service, Truffle Suite, Quorum Blockchain
case-study-microsoft-xbox.excerpt: Microsoft and EY partnered to develop royalty payment system for Xbox using Truffle and the Quorum blockchain.

case-study-starbucks.title: Case Study: Starbucks
case-study-starbucks.excerpt: Truffle’s suite of popular developer tools and Microsoft Azure integrate to enhance the developer experience and DevOps of Enterprise Ethereum.
